author: slomeo
body:
#### PR description:

Scenario 2026D55 = Scenario 2026D54 but  with "M5" instead of "M4"
In "M5" there are:
1) YE3 thickness: fixed (PR #29266 ) now also for 2026
2) "Hidden Overlaps" in the Muon System: fixed (PR #29379 ) now also for 2026
3) New version of iRPC (by @bapavlov) 

Fixed all overlaps due to iRPC (check by cmsShow)
Test of runTheMatrix ok
title: Created a new Phase2 Scenario (2026D55 ) with an updated Phase2 Muon Geometry (M5)
